Title: PostHog integration
introduction: You can bring LLM metrics from Keywords AI (YC W24) to your PostHog dashboard easily! Check out the [tutorial here](https://docs.keywordsai.co/integration/posthog)!

New.description: Added quick access to your 3 most recently applied filters on the logs page.
Added function calls in view code, making it easy to copy and paste the code into your own project.
Introduced a Load Balancing Group UI, allowing you to create your own load balancing groups through our load balancing page.

Improved.description: Upgraded the Fallback UI, enabling LLM developers to easily reorder fallback models using drag-and-drop.

Fixed.description: Fixed a bug where the model filter on the Dashboard was not working properly.​​
